data.title: Indie Jukebox
data.tagline: Tribute to Jukebox, popularly portraited from the movies' diner-set scenes.
data.content: The fascination with diners has a long history. Usually viewed as an optimistic central tenet of Americana, diner nostalgia is rooted in the modern mythologizing of the 1950s, a time when the American middle class was great and life was wonderful. For me, diners are indicative of the loneliness of traveling, especially in America.
